item.title: Line plot with Seaborn
item.description: Use Seaborn’s .relplot() with hue, hue_order, style, markers parameters to fully customize the chart 1sns.set_style('darkgrid') 2sns.set_palette('deep') 3sns.set_context('paper') 4 5g = sns.relplot(x='model_year_full', 6 y='horsepower', 7 data=car, 8 kind='line', 9 style='origin', 10 hue='origin', 11 hue_order=['usa', 'europe', 'japan'], 12 markers=True, 13 errorbar='sd', 14 height=5, 15 aspect=1.5 16 # dashes=False 17 # errorbar=True 18 ) 19 20plt.xticks( #rotation=45, 21 #y=0.025 22) 23plt.yticks( 24 # x=0.02 25) 26g.fig.suptitle('Car Model Year vs Hourse Power by Origin', y=1.

item.title: Building a Hugo blog from scratch
Writing Practice I
item.description: Task 1 Prompt The graph below shows the proportion of four different materials that were recycled from 1982 to 2010 in a particular country. Summarize the information by selecting and reporting the main features, and make comparisons where relevant. Write at least 150 words. Recycle Answer Throughout the decades, recycling rates for all the listed materials have been increasing in this country. To the citizens, this should be a good thing.

item.title: About
item.description: Of course, you want to check the About first! I’m Yao. I’m originally from Taiyuan and currently reside in Shanghai. 我是姚，现居上海的太原人。 Favorite channels: Thomas Flight All about cinema GeoWizard Geoguessr and more 稚嫩的魔法师 Paradox games Eddie Woo Picked up many math from him
